description: Determines whether this entity can be ridden. Allows specifying the different seat positions and amount.
title: Rideable

dismount_mode.title: Dismount Mode
dismount_mode.description:
Defines where riders are placed when dismounting this entity:
- "default", riders are placed on a valid ground position around the entity, or at the center of the entity's collision box if none is found.
- "on_top_center", riders are placed at the center of the top of the entity's collision box.

on_rider_enter_event.title: On Rider Enter Event
on_rider_enter_event.description: Event to execute on the owner entity when an entity starts riding it.

on_rider_exit_event.title: On Rider Exit Event
on_rider_exit_event.description: Event to execute on the owner entity when an entity stops riding it.

lock_rider_rotation.description: Angle in degrees that a rider is allowed to rotate while riding this entity. Omit this property for no limit
lock_rider_rotation.title: Lock Rider Rotation

max_rider_count.description: Defines the maximum number of riders that can be riding this entity for this seat to be valid.
max_rider_count.title: Max Rider Count

min_rider_count.description: Defines the minimum number of riders that need to be riding this entity before this seat can be used.
min_rider_count.title: Min Rider Count

position.description: Position of this seat relative to this entity's position.
position.title: Position

controlling_seat.description: The seat that designates the driver of the entity. Entities with the "minecraft:behavior.controlled_by_player" goal ignore this field and give control to any player in any seat.
controlling_seat.title: Controlling Seat

crouching_skip_interact.description: If true, this entity can't be interacted with if the entity interacting with it is crouching.
crouching_skip_interact.title: Crouching Skip Interact

family_types.title: Family Types
family_types.description: List of entities that can ride this entity.

interact_text.description: The text to display when the player can interact with the entity when playing with Touch-screen controls.
interact_text.title: Interact Text

passenger_max_width.title: Passenger Max Width
passenger_max_width.description: The max width a mob can have to be a rider. A value of 0 ignores this parameter.

pull_in_entities.description: If true, this entity will pull in entities that are in the correct family_types into any available seats.
pull_in_entities.title: Pull In Entities

rider_can_interact.description: If true, this entity will be picked when looked at by the rider.
rider_can_interact.title: Rider Can Interact

seat_count.description: The number of entities that can ride this entity at the same time.
seat_count.title: Seat Count

seats.description: The list of positions and number of riders for each position for entities riding this entity.
seats.title: Seats
